text: The Bridge Is Built () is a 1965 Soviet drama film directed by Gavriil Egiazarov and Oleg Efremov.«Я старалась не мешать Ефремову». Скромное счастье Аллы ПокровскойГлавные роли Аллы Покровской. Какой мы запомним актрису «Современника» и МХТ имени ЧеховаУмерла 81-летняя мать Михаила Ефремова == Plot == The film tells about the Moscow correspondent who goes to Saratov, where the construction of a highway bridge across the Volga is in progress.Строится мост == Cast == * Igor Vasilev as Sasha Malashkin * Oleg Tabakov as Sergei Zaytsev * Liliya Tolmacheva as Perova (as Lidiya Tolmachyova) * Galina Volchek as Young Girl * Yevgeniy Evstigneev as Sinaysky * Lyudmila Gurchenko as Zhenya * Oleg Dal as Yulian * Nina Doroshina as Sasha MalashkinaСтроится мост (1966) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films Category:1965 drama films
title: The Bridge Is Built
